Text.Page:
Some of the Scion heavy hitters still lurk in the bastion. Until we've secured those tunnels, Oblivion Woods isn't safe.

Take out {@LinkCreature:487#2002#bastion mystics}, {@LinkCreature:487#2003#sorcerers}, {@LinkCreature:487#2004#reapers}, {@LinkCreature:487#3001#lancers}, and {@LinkCreature:487#3002#slayers}.

Report back to me when you've sent 'em all back to the Dream.
I'm glad we had a veteran like you around. I could've sent a squad of less-experienced soldiers to do that jobâ€”and probably lost most of them. Thanks.
Don't come back until you've got enough badges to make me proud.
